definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯会把他当成一个左边锋还是中场球员？

sentences.english: Tackling well and playing penetrating balls from midfield are vital.
sentences.chinese: 中场的抢断和穿透性的出球是我们需要的。

sentences.english: Liverpool, meanwhile, are monitoring the young Preston North End midfielder Adam Barton.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦对普瑞斯顿的中场巴顿密切关注中。

sentences.english: Mancini had effectively lost his midfield.
sentences.chinese: 曼奇尼实际上输掉了中场。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣称切尔西试图签下中场埃辛的事情以失败告终。

sentences.english: When I started playing, midfielders were all- rounders.
sentences.chinese: 以前我开始踢球时，每个中场球员都是全能型的。

sentences.english: We all know that Cesc is already one of the best midfielders in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道塞斯克已经是这个世界最好的中场之一。

sentences.english: Lazio midfielder Gaby Mudingayi admits he's aware Liverpool are following him.
sentences.chinese: 拉齐奥中场穆丁加伊承认他知道利物浦正在追逐他。

sentences.english: Tight marking or even man marking in midfield can have massive effects on the defensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 中场的紧逼盯人甚至人盯人对防守相当有利。

sentences.english: Inter Milan midfielder Wesley Sneijder admitted that he was "close" to joining Manchester United this summer.
sentences.chinese: 国米中场斯内德承认自己今夏很接近转会曼联。

sentences.english: Our three players in midfield closed down the spaces well, and it worked perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 我们的三个中场球员围堵得很好，而且做得很成功。

sentences.english: But the concerns linger about whether the centre of their midfield is good enough.
sentences.chinese: 而关注的焦点依然是曼联的中场是否足够好。

sentences.english: During the interval, please request the other half of your tickets from the attendant at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 中场休息时请向门口服务员领取副券。

sentences.english: In midfield his Brazilians and Lewandowski as his lynchpin.
sentences.chinese: 中场是他的巴西人和勒万多斯基最为他的关键人物。

sentences.english: "Stefano would like to go to Bologna - he really likes that option, " agent Domenico Scopelliti told Laromasiamonoi. it.
sentences.chinese: 罗马中场奥卡卡的经纪人透露他将前往博洛尼亚。

sentences.english: We have a lot of players able to play on the left.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多的球员可以打左中场。

definition: Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
